title: Wonderfully Updated 4bd/4ba home in Redwood City, Friendly Acres
posting_body: An inviting ambiance welcomes you to this spacious 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom home in Redwood City.

Introduced by a hedge-lined pathway past the lush front lawn, this home enjoys 1,600 square feet of living space featuring floors of both tile and hardwood, divided light windows, and fresh interior paint.
A large living room/dining room combination offers great space to both relax and entertain, while the well-equipped kitchen features granite countertops and a gas range.
Four (4) comfortable bedrooms include three (3) with en suite bathrooms for maximum convenience.
Plus, this home offers air conditioning, dual pane windows, a tankless water heater, storage, and carport parking.
Conveniently located close to top tech companies including Meta/Facebook, this home is also approximately 2 miles from Redwood City's vibrant downtown area, and it offers easy access to US 101.
Open House appointments available on Friday Aug 12, Saturday Aug 13 and Sunday Aug 14.
Reply by email for an appointment to tour the house.
Property Address: 1108 Haven Ave, Redwood City 94063
